meanings.definition: A board game involving the rolling of dice and the moving of pieces around a track.
meanings.sent1: During the family game night, we played parchisi and had a lot of fun.
meanings.sent2: The children gathered around the table to play parchisi together.
meanings.sent3: In parchisi, my piece always gets stuck in the same spot, making everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: Life sometimes feels like a game of parchisi, with unexpected twists and turns.
meanings.sent5: The colorful board of parchisi made the game visually appealing.

meanings.definition: To play the board game parchisi.
meanings.sent1: Let's parchisi after dinner to relax and have a good time.
meanings.sent2: She enjoys parchisi with her friends on lazy Sunday afternoons.
meanings.sent3: When feeling bored, they decided to parchisi and pass the time joyfully.
meanings.sent4: His strategic moves in parchisi always surprise his opponents.
meanings.sent5: Parchisi can be a great way to bond with family and friends.
